title: Notification Server
description: Go microservice for notifications: Redpanda as the event queue, MongoDB for storage, REST API for fetching notifications and marking them as read. Uses Redis for caching and pub/sub. Work in progress — learning custom log (Zap) and OpenTelemetry wrappers, consumer groups, and health probes.
